description:
Having problems trying to sleep? Waking up in the morning feeling exhausted? The average person spends twenty years of their life asleep. This programme will help you reclaim this time to live with energy and passion.

*In this course, master hypnotist Brit guides you step by step through the process of what hinders and what helps you sleep, achieving much deeper levels of sleep much more quickly.

*This results in improved quality of sleep, naturally and easily reducing the time needed to sleep. One hour of Power Sleep is the equivalent of two hours of normal sleep.

*The course includes a powerful hypnotic video which prepares your mind and body for deep and restful power sleep.

*The course also includes a powerful hypnotic MP3 which guides you into power sleep and down into the deepest realms of restorative sleep.

*You awaken refreshed and invigorated with all the energy you need to live vibrantly and energetically with increased awareness and vitality.
title: Power Sleep spend less time sleeping & more time living!
